content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of 400 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 400 euros per month is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. The market rate for similar apartments in this area is around 600 euros per month. Would you be willing to offer closer to that amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that this apartment is new and well-located. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I can offer 450 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While I appreciate your offer, 450 euros per month is still below the market rate. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to offer 550 euros per month? This would be a more fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 500 euros per month. This is the highest I can offer as a student. I am smart and dependable. I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and I understand that you are a student with budget constraints. However, 500 euros per month is still not enough for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I need to receive at least 600 euros per month to cover my expenses and make a profit. Would you be able to offer closer to that amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, as a student, 600 euros per month is a high amount for me. I can offer 550 euros per month, which is the highest I can offer as a student. I promise to be a responsible tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 550 euros per month is still not enough for this apartment. I need to receive at least 600 euros per month to cover my costs and make a profit. If you are unable to offer that amount, I'm afraid we may not be able to reach an agreement. Is there anything else you can offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have already discussed the highest price I can offer as a student. I am smart and dependable. I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, but as a landlord, I must receive a fair market rent for my property. If 600 euros per month is not a price you can afford, I'm afraid we may not be able to reach an agreement. I appreciate your time and effort in negotiating, but I must prioritize finding a tenant who can meet my rental expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 600 euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment is a great investment for you as a student, and I'm sure you'll enjoy living in the city center. Let's proceed with the lease signing. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
